languages.text: "Значит, ты должен совершить такие подвиги в их честь, чтобы их имена помнили и через тысячу лет".
"This means you must perform feats of glory in their honour, that their names may be remembered a thousand years hence."
languages.original_text: "Значит, ты должен совершить такие подвиги в их честь, чтобы их имена помнили и через тысячу лет".

traits.locale_text: "This means you must perform feats of glory in their honour, that their names may be remembered a thousand years hence."
"This means you must perform feats of glory in their honour, that their names may be remembered a thousand years hence."
"This means you must perform feats of glory in their honour, that their names may be remembered a thousand years hence."
"This means you must perform feats of glory in their honour, that their names may be remembered a thousand years hence."

languages.text: «Eso significa que debe realizar proezas gloriosas en su honor para que sus nombres perduren mil años o más».
languages.original_text: "This means you must perform feats of glory in their honour, that their names may be remembered a thousand years hence."

traits.locale_text: «Eso significa que debe realizar proezas gloriosas en su honor para que sus nombres perduren mil años o más».

languages.text: “这意味着，你必须以他们的名字立下丰功伟绩，让他们的名字流芳千古。”
languages.original_text: "This means you must perform feats of glory in their honour, that their names may be remembered a thousand years hence."

traits.locale_text: “这意味着，你必须以他们的名字立下丰功伟绩，让他们的名字流芳千古。”

languages.text: 「それなら、彼らの名が数千年後に生きる者たちの心にも残るよう、彼らに敬意を表して栄光の偉業を果たさなねばならないな」
languages.original_text: "This means you must perform feats of glory in their honour, that their names may be remembered a thousand years hence."

traits.locale_text: 「それなら、彼らの名が数千年後に生きる者たちの心にも残るよう、彼らに敬意を表して栄光の偉業を果たさなねばならないな」

languages.text: « Autrement dit, vous allez devoir leur rendre hommage en multipliant les hauts faits et vous assurer que leurs noms restent gravés dans les mémoires pour les siècles des siècles. »
languages.original_text: "This means you must perform feats of glory in their honour, that their names may be remembered a thousand years hence."

traits.locale_text: « Autrement dit, vous allez devoir leur rendre hommage en multipliant les hauts faits et vous assurer que leurs noms restent gravés dans les mémoires pour les siècles des siècles. »

languages.text: "Das heißt, dass Ihr Heldentaten zu ihren Ehren ausüben müsst, auf dass man sich noch in eintausend Jahren an ihre Namen erinnert."
languages.original_text: "This means you must perform feats of glory in their honour, that their names may be remembered a thousand years hence."

traits.locale_text: "Das heißt, dass Ihr Heldentaten zu ihren Ehren ausüben müsst, auf dass man sich noch in eintausend Jahren an ihre Namen erinnert."

languages.text: "İsimleri yüzlerce yıl boyunca unutulmasın diye onların onuru uğruna şanlı yiğitlikler yapman gerekiyor."
languages.original_text: "This means you must perform feats of glory in their honour, that their names may be remembered a thousand years hence."

traits.locale_text: "İsimleri yüzlerce yıl boyunca unutulmasın diye onların onuru uğruna şanlı yiğitlikler yapman gerekiyor."
